channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLmoneyAndMarkets
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLmoneyAndMarkets, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How to afford retirement in America? Keep working.
item.description: Growing numbers of workers now plan to work part time in retirement, either because they want to, need to or both.

item.title: The guy behind retirement’s 4% rule now thinks that’s way too low. Here’s how much more money you could spend.
item.description: Bill Bengen revised his formula and has a new “rule” for retirement investors.

item.title: Abercrombie’s stock back in rally mode as outlook shows tariffs won’t hurt sales

item.title: Macy’s says it’s being ‘surgical’ with price hikes amid tariffs, will eat some costs
item.description: “We’re being incredibly surgical about the situation with tariffs,” said Macy’s Chief Financial Officer Adrian Mitchell.

item.title: GameStop makes its first bitcoin buy. Here’s why the stock is pulling back.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
